name: Bibou
description: Explore the island to take the Yellow Stones.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows Memory: 256 MB RAM Graphics: DirectX or OpenGL Compatible Video card Storage: 120 MB available space

reviews.review_text: Oh boy, for real, I spent 10minutes figuring out the controls because I missed the instruction image, which lasted like 3 seconds and poop its gone. And you can't even win the game, it's difficult af. Oh and btw the minigame uses mouse but the others don't, have fun wasting your time.

This is a pixeled graphics aventure game with lot of fun and wierd creatures and maps which may/will remind you childhood games such mario or others. Since i'm not a pixel gamer i liked and find this game very cute, enjoyable and laughable. Have simple challeging, control, colours and moves. The sound is super perfect and addictive. This game maybe or might require use with a controller but I was satisfied using keyboard(I am used to it) without no problem. The price fits perfectly and i would recommend this game to anyone.

I think, I can describe Bibou using just 3 words: funny, cute, hard. Its good platformer with 8-bit style, artwork is not so bad too. Soundtrack is exactly what I want :) And as its platformer, better using controller to play, believe me xD
